title: Help regarding bca interview
content: hiee!! Is anyone about to give bca interview today?? Or has given it before!! Can ya help me with it like mine was rescheduled for today idk what will happen if u donâ€™t mind sharing pls tell!!

comments.body: I'm giving mca interview today im currently in the waiting room until they let me in

it should be mad easy i took it a while back. just when they ask you bout languages mention those u r really good at or the easiest to you yk like anything from there u will answer easily. which once u do, they will ask simple questions related to the programming languages u told. and u would most probably pass it
